contents.text: Thank you for calling PeopleConnect Staffing in San Francisco, where we connect promising companies with the talented professionals who drive success.
To speak with our Recruitment Team, please press 1.
If you are a company looking to hire top talent, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a recruitment specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss hiring a software engineer and get a specialist on the line.
I’m calling on behalf of my veteran-owned logistics company to hire experienced supply chain managers.
Discuss sourcing a senior Python backend engineer with expertise in AWS microservices.
I’d like to hire a part-time caregiver to help me at home.
I need to hire research assistants for my physics project.

contents.text: If you are a professional seeking career opportunities, press 2.
One moment please while we connect you to our talent advisors.

navigationGoals: I'm looking for new project management job opportunities with your recruiters.
I’d like to explore civilian engineering roles now that I’ve left the military.
Explore full-stack developer opportunities leveraging React, Node.js, and Kubernetes.
I’m looking for a flexible part-time job I can do.
I'm looking for internship or entry-level research positions in physics.

contents.text: For inquiries about existing placements and account status, press 2.
To discuss your current recruitment project, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to your project coordinator.

navigationGoals: I want an update on the status of my ongoing recruitment project.
I need an update on the status of my job placement from last month.
Get an update on our current DevOps recruitment project: candidate pipeline, interview schedule, and time-to-fill metrics.
I want to check the placement status of the caregiver I arranged.
I'd like an update on the candidate shortlist for my lab's recruitment.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, or administrative support, press 2.
Please stay on the line and we will connect you to our support team shortly.

navigationGoals: I have questions about my invoice and billing for your staffing services.
I need assistance with my invoice for your staffing services last quarter.
Resolve a discrepancy in our latest invoice and clarify billing terms for the ATS integration subscription.
I need assistance understanding my caregiver service invoice.
I need details about the invoice for the recruitment services we used.
